## TrailingNodeExtensionOptions interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface TrailingNodeExtensionOptions extends BaseExtensionOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [disableTags](./core-extensions.trailingnodeextensionoptions.disabletags.md) | <code>boolean</code> | By default this extension will set trailing nodes for all nodes except for the ones that have the tag <code>Tags.LastNodeCompatible</code>. Setting this to true means that the only nodes that will be ignored are those passed to the <code>ignoredNodes</code> array. |
|  [ignoredNodes](./core-extensions.trailingnodeextensionoptions.ignorednodes.md) | <code>string[]</code> | The nodes for which this rule should not apply. |
|  [nodeName](./core-extensions.trailingnodeextensionoptions.nodename.md) | <code>string</code> | The node to create at the end of the document.<!-- -->\*\*Note\*\*: the nodeName will always be added to the ignoredNodes lists to prevent an infinite loop. |
